title: A Patriot's Act
description: When a naturalized American citizen turns up missing in Iraq, Brent Marks fights the Goliath US Government's Patriot Act. Santa Barbara accountant Ahmed Khury responds to the plea of his brother, a suspected money launderer in Iraq. Before Ahmed realizes what has happened, he is sent to Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp as a suspected terrorist, and is tortured to extract information that he doesn't have. The courtroom drama mounts as the drama outside the courtroom explodes, and when murder, corruption, and cover-up enter the picture, nobody, including Brent, is safe.
author: Kenneth Eade
